verses.verse: By night <WH3915> on my bed <WH4904> I sought <WH1245> him whom my soul <WH5315> loveth <WH157>: I sought <WH1245> him <WH4672>, but I found him not.

I said <WH6965>, I will rise now <WH5437>, and go about the city <WH5892>; In the streets <WH7784> and in the broad ways <WH7339> I will seek <WH1245> him whom my soul <WH5315> loveth <WH157>: I sought <WH1245> him <WH4672>, but I found him not.
The watchmen <WH8104> that go about <WH5437> the city <WH5892> found <WH4672> me <WH7200>; To whom I said, Saw ye him whom my soul <WH5315> loveth <WH157>?

It was but a little <WH4592> that I passed <WH5674> from them <WH4672>, When I found him whom my soul <WH5315> loveth <WH157>: I held <WH270> him <WH7503>, and would not let him go, Until I had brought <WH935> him into my mother <WH517>'s house <WH1004>, And into the chamber <WH2315> of her that conceived me <WH2029>.

I adjure <WH7650> you <WH1323>, O daughters of Jerusalem <WH3389>, By the roes <WH6643>, or <WH176> by the hinds <WH355> of the field <WH7704>, That ye stir not up <WH5782>, nor awake <WH5782> my love <WH160>, Until he please <WH2654>.

Who is this that cometh <WH5927> up from the wilderness <WH4057> Like pillars <WH8490> of smoke <WH6227>, Perfumed <WH6999> with myrrh <WH4753> and frankincense <WH3828>, With all powders <WH81> of the merchant <WH7402>?
Behold <WH8010>, it is the litter <WH4296> Threescore <WH8346> mighty <WH1368> men are about <WH5439> it <WH1368>, Of the mighty men of Israel <WH3478>.
They all handle <WH270> the sword <WH2719>, and are expert <WH3925> in war <WH4421>: Every man <WH376> hath his sword <WH2719> upon his thigh <WH3409>, Because of fear <WH6343> in the night <WH3915>.
King <WH4428> Solomon <WH8010> made <WH6213> himself a palanquin <WH668> Of the wood <WH6086> of Lebanon <WH3844>.

He made <WH6213> the pillars <WH5982> thereof of silver <WH3701>, The bottom <WH7507> thereof of gold <WH2091>, the seat <WH4817> of it of purple <WH713>, The midst <WH8432> thereof being paved <WH7528> with love <WH160>, From the daughters <WH1323> of Jerusalem <WH3389>.

Go forth <WH3318>, O ye daughters <WH1323> of Zion <WH6726>, and behold <WH7200> king <WH4428> Solomon <WH8010>, With the crown <WH5850> wherewith his mother <WH517> hath crowned <WH5849> him In the day <WH3117> of his espousals <WH2861>, And in the day <WH3117> of the gladness <WH8057> of his heart <WH3820>.
